task.title: Peanut Butter Oatmeal Smoothie
task.shortdesc: This smoothie is packed with protein and will satisfy your sweet tooth to save you from reaching for that doughnut

taskbody.prereq:
For this recipe you will need a blender. Ingredients are as follows:
1/2 cup soy milk
1/2 cup milk
2 tbsp peanut butter
1 whole banana
1/4 cup old-fashioned oats

step.cmd: Add all ingredients to the blender.

info.note: Be sure that the blender is unplugged and in an "off" position while adding ingredients or stirring. The blades are sharp and could cause injury if not careful.

step.cmd: Blend on a medium speed for 30 seconds then turn blender off
Place lid back on blender and blend on a medium speed for 30-60 seconds until smoothie is at desired consistency

taskbody.postreq: This smoothie will fill you up without weighing you down. Because you chose a healthier alternative for breakfast, you can eat more dessert at dinnertime!
